promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic epic clam water-type pokemon with a cyan glittering crystal core. It can be found in lake-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or clam. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aquamysta, a a gigantic epic clam water-type pokemon. It can be found in lake-like environments It has the following abilities: Hydro Press, Void Tentacles. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "clam", "water" or "Aquamysta". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, clam-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sparkling blue background
generatedDescription: Dwelling in lake realms, the colossal seashell Aquamysta wields Hydro Press & Void Tentacles. It nurtures life while shielding secrets beneath its shell.
